entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow and freezing rain near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
